entry.title: Unesco Global conference on internet for democracy - Paris Feb 21-23

link.title: Unesco Global conference on internet for democracy - Paris Feb 21-23

entry.content:
On the 21-23 of February 2023, UNESCO will hold a 3 days conference on the topic of Internet for Democracy in its Parisian headquarters. The event is co-organized by RadicalXChange France and #leplusimportant.

The conference will gather experts the world over to ministers, regulators, judicial actors, the private sector, the UN family, civil society, academia, intergovernmental organizations to shape up guidelines on the regulation of digital platforms and information as a public good.

RadicalXChange France will be conducting interviews of participants in relationship with the ideas and toolbox developed by the Fiundation in regard to these topics. The feedbacks will be summarized and serve at the opening of the fourth roundtable. They will also be shared publicly here.

The event is open to the public on the 21st only, please come and meet us. Donâ€™t forget to register.

As always, want to get in touch? Discord, Twitter or email.
entry.summary: On the 21-23 of February 2023, UNESCO will hold a 3 days conference on the topic of Internet for Democracy in its Parisian headquarters. The event is co-organized by RadicalXChange France and #leplusimportant.
